title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend with LangChain abstractions.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports generate, chat, pull, list, delete, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; idiomatic Ruby blocks for streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (Terminal UI) for chatting with Ollama models written in Rust.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding copilot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any Discord server with slash commands.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, GPU support, and monitoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-express
summary: Lightweight Express.js proxy that adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with generate, chat, and embedding methods.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated registry of custom Ollama Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within your notes.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama supporting threads, app mentions, and per-channel model selection.
